name: inclusive-pattern-library
description: An inclusive pattern library builder for documenting inclusive interface design

scripts.setup: hugo && git add public && git commit -m 'Make git acknowledge public folder' && rm -rf content && mkdir content
scripts.publish: hugo && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix public master`:gh-pages --force

author: Heydon Pickering <heydon@heydonworks.com> (http://www.heydonworks.com)
